properties.displayName: Removal Of Index Value to Hide Schedule Task - Registry
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where (ActionType in~ ("RegistryKeyDeleted", "RegistryValueDeleted")) and (RegistryKey contains "\\SOFTWARE\\Microsoft\\Windows NT\\CurrentVersion\\Schedule\\TaskCache\\Tree" and RegistryKey contains "Index")

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects when the "index" value of a scheduled task is removed or deleted from the registry. Which effectively hides it from any tooling such as "schtasks /query"
